name: I HAVE SEEN THE TRUTH AND IT IS SILLY
name_original: I HAVE SEEN THE TRUTH AND IT IS SILLY
description:
I HAVE SEEN THE TRUTH AND IT IS SILLY is an interactive narrative game about discovering, understanding, and questioning Old English riddles.
Medieval riddles are closely interlinked with the broader genre of Old English poetry and are partially the result of oral-formulaic composition. They feel like short stories that incorporate a varied set of cultural references, vivid imagery, and language. Through centuries of iterations, medieval riddles become creative interpretations of a supository of knowledge in any form - cultural, intellectual, philosophical, literary.

Your name is DETECTIVE FICTION. You work for the police department in a town populated by personified literary genres. Your chief, a Riddle named WIND-STORM, has assigned you to a mystifying string of disappearances in the Old English Riddle community. After months of hitting dead-ends, another Riddle goes missing.

Ya gotta get back to work...
